verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only in God is my soul at rest In Him comes my salvation He only is my Rock My strength and my salvation .{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Stronghold, my Savior I shall not be afraid at all My Stronghold, my Savior I shall not be moved.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only in God is found safety When the enemy pursues me, Only in God is found glory When I am found meek and found lowly.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My Stronghold, my Savior I shall not be afraid at all My Stronghold, my Savior I shall not be moved.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only in God is my soul at rest In Him comes my salvation.{/lang-eng}
